TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SecurityException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 检测到安全错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a security error is detected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个调用方没有所需访问资源的权限时将引发异常。A exception is thrown when a caller does not have the permissions required to access a resource. 下面的示例实例化包括的对象对象，以允许访问用户界面对象和剪贴板和对象以防止注册表访问权限。The following example instantiates a object that includes a object to allow access to UI objects and the Clipboard and a object to prevent registry access. 对调用方法意味着这些权限将应用而不考虑分配给调用方的权限。The call to the method means that these permissions will apply regardless of the permissions assigned to the caller. 因此，创建注册表项的尝试会引发。As a result, the attempt to create a registry key throws a . [!code-csharp[System.SecurityException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.securityexception.class/cs/se_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.SecurityException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.securityexception.class/vb/se_ex1.vb#1)] 使用 HRESULT COR_E_SECURITY，其值 0x8013150A。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_SECURITY, which has the value 0x8013150A. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表类，请参阅特定构造函数。For a list of the initial property values for an instance of the class, see a specific constructor.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 类的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.| ## Examples 有关用法的示例构造函数，为提供的示例，请参阅构造函数。For an example of the use of a constructor, see the example provided for the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction Action { System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::SecurityAction value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置导致异常的安全操作。

span.span: Gets or sets the security action that caused the exception.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含导致安全检查失败的安全操作。The property contains the security action that caused the security check failure. 许多安全操作会导致引发安全异常。Many of the security actions can cause a security exception to be thrown. 例如，对权限的需求设置检查调用堆栈上的所有调用方具有所需的权限在权限集中。For example, a demand on a permission set checks that all callers on the call stack have the necessary permissions in the permission set. 如果调用堆栈上的任何调用方不具有所需的权限，该安全检查失败。If any caller on the call stack lacks a required permission, the security check fails. 或者，调用链中的方法可以修改的堆栈遍历结果上来堆栈遍历修饰符，如或，以限制允许的权限在堆栈上。Alternatively, a method in the call chain can modify the outcome of the stack walk by placing a stack walk modifier, such as or , on the stack to limit the allowed permissions. 例如，调用堆栈上的方法可能全部拒绝其调用方的一组权限的名为 PSET1，以便属于 PSET1 的权限的任何请求这些调用方也将失败。For example, a method on the call stack might deny all of its callers a set of permissions named PSET1, such that any demand for a permission that is part of PSET1 fails for those callers. 属性包含导致引发异常的安全操作。The property contains the security action that caused the exception to be thrown. 是一个枚举，在提供的安全操作值的命名空间属性。 is an enumeration in the namespace that provides the security action value for the property. 通常此属性包含下表中显示的值之一。Typically this property contains one of the values shown in the following table. |安全操作Security action|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||完整的堆栈审核失败，因为针对通过标识的程序集提出的需求属性。A full stack walk failed due to a demand made against the assembly identified by the property.| ||针对程序集标识的链接要求属性的操作失败。A link demand against the assembly identified by the property failed.| ||由标识程序集属性无法满足继承要求。An assembly identified by the property failed to meet an inheritance demand.| ||所需的权限与中的任何权限不匹配权限集。A demanded permission did not match any permission in the permission set. 放置的方法在调用堆栈由属性。The method that placed the on the call stack is identified by the property.| ||所需的权限相匹配的拒绝权限集上调用堆栈中的权限。A demanded permission matched a permission in the deny permission set on the call stack. 放置的方法在调用堆栈由属性。The method that placed the on the call stack is identified by the property.|

summary.span: 获取或设置未通过验证的所需的安全权限、权限集或权限集的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the demanded security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that failed.

value.span: 权限、权限集或权限集的集合对象。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于返回的权限集或权限集集合，返回的对象包含所有要求的权限，一个或多个这导致失败。In the case of a returned permission set or permission set collection, the returned object contains all the demanded permissions, one or more of which caused the failure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示所需的安全权限、 权限集或权限设置失败的集合。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the demanded security permission, permission set, or permission set collection that failed. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含拒绝的权限、 权限集或导致安全检查失败的权限集集合。This property contains the denied permission, permission set, or permission set collection that caused the security check to fail. 它是`null`的不由拒绝导致的异常。It is `null` for exceptions that are not caused by a Deny. 属性属于类型因为它可以包含一个权限，设置权限，或设置了权限的集合。The property is of type because it can contain a permission, a permission set, or a permission set collection. 若要测试此属性的运行时类型，可以使用方法或特定语言的运算符，如 C# 中的运算符或 Visual Basic 中的运算符。To test the run-time type of this property, you can use the method or a specific language operator, such as the operator in C# or the operator in Visual Basic.

summary.span: 获取或设置关于失败的程序集的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets information about the failed assembly.

value.span: 一个 ，用于标识失败的程序集。

span.span: An that identifies the failed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含对象，用于标识导致安全检查失败的程序集。This property contains an object that identifies the assembly that caused the security check to fail. > [!NOTE] > 在发生安全异常时，不填充此属性或堆栈帧，因为程序集发出或安全操作不是失败堆栈遍历的程序集。This property is not populated when a security exception occurs in a or stack frame, because the assembly issuing the or security action is not the assembly that failed the stack walk. 在这些情况下，使用不需要程序集名称的构造函数创建的安全异常授予设置信息，或拒绝集信息。In these cases, the security exception is created with a constructor that does not require an assembly name, granted set information, or refused set information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示有关失败的程序集的信息。The following code example shows the use of the property to display the information about the failed assembly. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#12)]

summary.span: 获取或设置权限集中的第一个权限或者导致要求失败的权限集集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the first permission in a permission set or permission set collection that failed the demand.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示第一个失败的权限。

span.span: An object representing the first permission that failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求的对象是一个权限集或权限集集合，表示仅导致异常的第一个权限。If the demanded object is a permission set or permission set collection, the represents only the first permission that caused the exception. 组或集合中的其他权限也会导致要求失败。Additional permissions in the set or collection can also cause a demand failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetObjectData` 使用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据设置 。`GetObjectData` sets a with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 反序列化期间，从通过流传输的 `SerializationInfo` 重建异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the `SerializationInfo` transmitted over the stream. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来显示中包含的权限状态对象。The following code shows the use of the method to display the permission state contained in the object. [!code-cpp[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.SecurityException#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.SecurityException/VB/form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 获取或设置关于与异常关联的方法的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets the information about the method associated with the exception.

value.span: 一个描述方法的 对象。

span.span: A object describing the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含以下项之一：This property contains one of the following: - 有关失败的程序集的安全检查触发了异常发生时正在执行的方法的信息。Information about the method that the failed assembly was executing when the security check that triggered the exception occurred. - 有关放置或者方法的信息或安全操作的调用堆栈，发生故障时由于或。Information about the method that placed either a or security action on the call stack, in the case of a failure due to a or . - `null`在出现故障时，是不可能是由特定方法。`null`, in the case of a failure that is impossible to attribute to a specific method. 对象提供的方法名称、 类名和程序集名称唯一标识该方法的信息。The object provides the method name, class name, and assembly name information that uniquely identifies the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置权限、权限集或权限集集合，它是导致安全检查失败的唯一允许堆栈帧的一部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the permission, permission set, or permission set collection that is part of the permit-only stack frame that caused a security check to fail.

value.span: 权限、权限集或权限集的集合对象。

span.span: A permission, permission set, or permission set collection object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性表示允许的权限、 权限集或权限集导致安全异常的堆栈帧中包含的集合。The property represents the permitted permission, permission set, or permission set collection contained in the stack frame that caused the security exception. 例如，安全异常发生时由于失败，出现在此属性中，并且要求的允许的权限中包含属性。For instance, when a security exception occurs because of a failure, the permitted permission appears in this property and the demanded is contained in the property. 此属性属于类型因为权限、 权限集或权限集的集合都可以进行要求和是公共的基类。This property is of type because permissions, permission sets, or permission set collections can all be demanded and is their common base class. 若要测试此属性的运行时类型，可以使用方法或特定语言的运算符，如 C# 中的运算符或 Visual Basic 中的运算符。To test the run-time type of this property, you can use the method or a specific language operator, such as the operator in C# or the operator in Visual Basic.
